column2: plot.5yr_yes <- ggplot(df.raw %>% select(Q2.3, grep("Q7.3", names(df.raw))) %>% filter(Q2.3 == "Yes") %>% gather(statement, response, 2:5), mapping = aes(x = factor(statement))) +
plot.5yr_no <- ggplot(df.raw %>% select(Q2.3, grep("Q7.3", names(df.raw))) %>% filter(Q2.3 == "No") %>% gather(statement, response, 2:5), mapping = aes(x = factor(statement))) +
ggarrange(plot.5yr_yes, plot.5yr_no, ncol = 2, common.legend = TRUE, legend = "top")
